GitLab Runner for Linux

Create Runner on GitLab GUI
http://<hostname or IP address of GitLab>/<Group name>/<Project name>/-/settings/ci_cd
Project > Settings > CI/CD > Runners

After registering it the token will be generated

Install GitLab Runner into Target Host
$ sudo dnf localinstall -y gitlab-runner-16.6.0-1.x86_64.rpm
https://docs.gitlab.com/runner/install/linux-repository.html#installing-gitlab-runner

Register Runner on Target Host
https://gitlab-docs.creationline.com/runner/register/
$ sudo gitlab-runner register \
  --non-interactive \
  --url "https://192.168.10.11/" \
  --token "glrt-vXfPjxuUeNYxGgiUSL_J" \
  --executor "shell" \
  --description "test"
